mng: namely, that is, i.e., prompt, at once, at present, even if, prompted (by the occasion), to approach, to come into contact, to assume (office), to draw near

exm.mng: equivalent to 就可以, can then (do sth), can immediately (do sth), (do sth) and that will suffice
on the eve of, to be about to, to be on the verge of
to succeed to the throne, accession
this or that very day, in the next few days
even if, even though, right away, immediately
